hero: This is Ezgi Karaca, a philosophy graduate and a thinker, now stepping into the world of software development as a learner. My deep understanding of human nature and my creative thinking skills give me unique perspectives in the software development process. I have a passion for innovation and problem-solving, and I use technology to create solutions that make life more meaningful and effective for people.
javascript_description: JavaScript is a dynamic scripting language used to create interactive effects within web browsers.
react_description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
nodejs_description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.
css_description: CSS is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.
html_description: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard language for creating web pages. It structures the content and layout of a webpage using elements like headings, paragraphs, links, and multimedia.
github_description: GitHub is a web-based platform for version control and collaboration. It allows developers to track changes in their code, collaborate with others, and manage projects using Git.
figma_description: Figma is a cloud-based design tool used for creating user interfaces, prototypes, and collaborative design projects. It allows teams to work together in real-time, sharing designs and feedback.
aboutTxt: I studied philosophy, focusing on developing my thinking process, analytical skills, and problem-solving abilities. Now, Iâ€™m embarking on a new journey in the world of software development. By integrating the systematic thinking skills I gained through philosophy into the development process, I create deeper and more effective solutions for every project. I am constantly striving to improve myself, generate innovative solutions, and use technology to make people's lives more efficient and meaningful.
projectDescriptionOne: A webpage has been created that allows users to sort movies and add the films they want to their list for storage. Thus, users can add the movies they wish to watch to their lists and, after watching them, can remove these films from their lists if they choose.
projectDescriptionTwo: A website has been created that allows us to sort movies and add or remove desired films from favorites. Additionally, users can add new movies to the list and view the details of the films if they wish.
projectDescriptionThree: A website has been created that includes a calculator that performs basic mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
